about_the_game:
NOTE: THE MAIN GAME X-PLANE 10 IS NOT AVAILABLE ANYMORE! PLEASE ONLY PURCHASE DLCS WHEN YOU ARE ALREADY OWNER OF X-PLANE 10!


The Carenado line of aircraft has been well acclaimed by users and reviewers for many years and for good reason. They are well constructed, looks good and have impeccable behavior in flight. The cockpits are accurate and well equipped.

Features


  • Plugin-enhanced
  • FPS-optimized model
  • NEW! Scroll wheel support
  • DDS textures for faster load times and optimization
  • Original Aspen EFD1000 EFIS installed (available as pop-up window)
  • Original KFC225 Autopilot installed
  • 3D gauges
  • Two GNS430 installed
  • Original HQ digital stereo sounds recorded directly from the real aircraft
  • 2D windows: Cameras (for setting different cameras and field of view) and Options (for opening doors, hiding window reflections and static elements)
  • Accurately reproduced flight characteristics (tested by real Bonanza pilots)
  • Realistic night lights effect on gauges and virtual cockpit
  • Polygon optimized model
  • Full moving parts: Ailerons, elevators, rudders, flaps, rolling wheels and trim tab
  • Animated sections such as: propeller, doors, windows, sunvisors
  • Interactive virtual cockpit
  • Toggle yoke
  • Realistic weight and balance

Included in the package


  • 4 liveries
  • 1 white livery
  • Normal and Emergency Procedures
  • Performance tables PDF
  • Quick reference table PDF
  • Autopilot KFC224 PDF
  • EFD100 Manual PDF
  • Recommended Settings PDF
detailed_description:
NOTE: THE MAIN GAME X-PLANE 10 IS NOT AVAILABLE ANYMORE! PLEASE ONLY PURCHASE DLCS WHEN YOU ARE ALREADY OWNER OF X-PLANE 10!


The Carenado line of aircraft has been well acclaimed by users and reviewers for many years and for good reason. They are well constructed, looks good and have impeccable behavior in flight. The cockpits are accurate and well equipped.

Features


  • Plugin-enhanced
  • FPS-optimized model
  • NEW! Scroll wheel support
  • DDS textures for faster load times and optimization
  • Original Aspen EFD1000 EFIS installed (available as pop-up window)
  • Original KFC225 Autopilot installed
  • 3D gauges
  • Two GNS430 installed
  • Original HQ digital stereo sounds recorded directly from the real aircraft
  • 2D windows: Cameras (for setting different cameras and field of view) and Options (for opening doors, hiding window reflections and static elements)
  • Accurately reproduced flight characteristics (tested by real Bonanza pilots)
  • Realistic night lights effect on gauges and virtual cockpit
  • Polygon optimized model
  • Full moving parts: Ailerons, elevators, rudders, flaps, rolling wheels and trim tab
  • Animated sections such as: propeller, doors, windows, sunvisors
  • Interactive virtual cockpit
  • Toggle yoke
  • Realistic weight and balance

Included in the package

  • 1 white livery

  • Performance tables PDF
  • Quick reference table PDF
  • Autopilot KFC224 PDF
  • EFD100 Manual PDF
  • Recommended Settings PDF

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04LTS or compatible
  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with at least 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04LTS or compatible
  • Processor: 3 GHz, multi-core CPU (or, even better, multiple processors)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with 2 GB of on-board, dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

  • Storage: 350 MB available space
